extracted_playbook.title: Update Operating Systems and Software
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure all operating systems and software are up to date. Regularly check for software updates and end of life (EOL) notifications, and prioritize patching known exploited vulnerabilities.

extracted_playbook.title: Patch Cloud Environments
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure that virtual machines, serverless applications, and third-party libraries in cloud environments are patched regularly.

extracted_playbook.title: Automate Security Scanning and Testing
extracted_playbook.description: Automate software security scanning and testing when possible to identify vulnerabilities early.

extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade Hardware and Software
extracted_playbook.description: Consider upgrading hardware and software to take advantage of vendor-provided virtualization and security capabilities.

extracted_playbook.title: Secure and Monitor RDP
extracted_playbook.description: Secure and monitor RDP and other potentially risky services. Limit access to resources over internal networks, especially by restricting RDP and using virtual desktop infrastructure.

extracted_playbook.title: Restrict RDP Sources and Require MFA
extracted_playbook.description: If RDP is necessary, restrict the originating sources and require MFA to mitigate credential theft and reuse.

extracted_playbook.title: Use VPN for External RDP
extracted_playbook.description: If RDP must be available externally, use a VPN, virtual desktop infrastructure, or other means to authenticate and secure the connection before allowing RDP to connect to internal devices.

extracted_playbook.title: Monitor and Log RDP Access
extracted_playbook.description: Monitor remote access/RDP logs, enforce account lockouts after a specified number of attempts, log RDP login attempts, and disable unused remote access/RDP ports.

extracted_playbook.title: Configure Devices and Disable Unused Ports
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure devices are properly configured and that security features are enabled. Disable ports and protocols that are not being used for a business purpose.

extracted_playbook.title: Restrict SMB Protocol
extracted_playbook.description: Restrict Server Message Block (SMB) Protocol within the network to only access necessary servers and remove or disable outdated versions of SMB.

extracted_playbook.title: Review Third-Party Vendor Security
extracted_playbook.description: Review the security posture of third-party vendors and ensure all connections are monitored and reviewed for suspicious activity.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Application Whitelisting
extracted_playbook.description: Implement listing policies for applications and remote access that only allow systems to execute known and permitted programs.

extracted_playbook.title: Open Document Readers in Protected Mode
extracted_playbook.description: Open document readers in protected viewing modes to help prevent active content from running.

extracted_playbook.title: Segment Networks
extracted_playbook.description: Segment networks to control traffic flows and restrict adversary lateral movement.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement End-to-End Encryption
extracted_playbook.description: Deploy mutual Transport Layer Security (mTLS) to prevent eavesdropping on communications.

extracted_playbook.title: Monitor Network for Abnormal Activity
extracted_playbook.description: Identify, detect, and investigate abnormal activity and potential traversal of ransomware with a network-monitoring tool.

extracted_playbook.title: Document External Remote Connections
extracted_playbook.description: Document approved solutions for remote management and maintenance and investigate unapproved solutions immediately.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Time-Based Access for Privileged Accounts
extracted_playbook.description: Use just-in-time access methods to provision privileged access when needed and enforce the principle of least privilege.

extracted_playbook.title: Enforce Principle of Least Privilege
extracted_playbook.description: Minimize unnecessary privileges for identities and regularly audit account privileges against usage patterns.

extracted_playbook.title: Reduce Credential Exposure
extracted_playbook.description: Enforce credential protection by restricting where accounts and credentials can be used and using local device credential protection features.

extracted_playbook.title: Disable Unneeded Command-Line Utilities
extracted_playbook.description: Disable unneeded command-line utilities, constrain scripting activities and permissions, and monitor their usage.

extracted_playbook.title: Maintain Offline Backups
extracted_playbook.description: Maintain offline backups of data and regularly test backup and restoration processes.

extracted_playbook.title: Encrypt and Secure Cloud Backups
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure all backup data is encrypted, immutable, and covers the entire organizationâ€™s data infrastructure. Consider storing encryption keys outside the cloud.

extracted_playbook.title: Collect Telemetry from Cloud Environments
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure that telemetry from cloud environments is retained and visible to the security team.

extracted_playbook.title: Review CISA-FBI Advisory for Critical Infrastructure
extracted_playbook.description: Review joint CISA-FBI Cybersecurity Advisory for additional recommendations to reduce the risk of severe business or functional degradation from ransomware.
